meanings.sent1: The santeros in our community gather to celebrate important rituals.
meanings.sent2: The group of santeros performed a traditional dance during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The santeros decided to have a potluck to share their favorite dishes.
meanings.sent4: The santeros' dedication to their beliefs is as strong as a towering oak tree.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the santeros added a vibrant touch to the event.

meanings.sent1: Many santeros attended the festival to honor their ancestors.
meanings.sent2: The santeros chanted prayers together in unison.
meanings.sent3: The group of santeros accidentally wore matching outfits to the gathering.
meanings.sent4: The santeros' unity was like a shining beacon in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The harmonious voices of the santeros filled the room with warmth and joy.
